title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: When the font size of a label is modified, the label height does not immediately change to accommodate the new font size.
OB: The label height remains the same even after modifying the font size in the UI.
EB: The label should adjust its height to match the new font size when it is modified.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the UI where the label is displayed.
2. Modify the font size of the label.
3. Observe that the label height does not change to match the new font size.
